title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Senior backend engineer responsible for developing and maintaining scalable ecommerce and retail integrations, contributing to platform reliability, API development and design, and automation initiatives across the technology team.

title: Platform Integration Manager (Software Developer Lead)
description:
Architected and led the development of IGA Rewards, a customer loyalty platform for over 1,400 IGA stores across Australia. Responsibilities included end-to-end project management, full-stack development, API design and implementation, cloud infrastructure management, CI/CD pipeline setup, and team leadership.

The platform integrated with various third-party services and internal systems to provide a seamless user experience.

Program delivered a consistent average of 12% uplift in basket size, significantly enhancing customer engagement and loyalty. Created the online shop from the time of COVID which integrated with all of the last-mile delivery services.

title: Senior Developer
description: Delivered end-to-end cloud-hosted business mobility solutions. Responsibilities included gathering requirements, providing pre-sales estimates, project management, full-stack development, API development, deployment, testing, and documentation. Solutions integrated with client databases, workflows, and third-party systems.

title: Analyst Programmer
description: Led development and maintenance of internal fullstack applications. Projects included CRM systems, email/attachment processors, client-facing ecommerce management systems, a custom MVC REST interface with API development, a risk register, and customer information websites.

title: Interactive Developer
description: Developed branded websites using CSS, HTML, jQuery, and PHP. Worked with CMS platforms including Magento and WordPress. Collaborated closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and define platform targets.

title: Software Developer
description: Focused on development of 'LEAP Documents', a document management system for legal firms, using the 4th Dimension (4D) platform.

title: Data Analyst / Network Administrator
description: Monitored network health, developed automation scripts for software patching and reporting, and managed procurement of IT equipment.

title: Software Support Consultant
description: Supported the 'Domain' property management software. Maintained a knowledge base, analyzed internal code to improve support, and trained new recruits.

title: Software Support Consultant
description: Provided support for the Billback suite, used to capture telecom and email-related costs. Served as the primary support contact for the 'Domain' conveyancing management software.

title: I.C.U. Shift Leader
description: Led a team in the Investigation in the Community Unit (ICU) to detect and prevent cheating in Runescape. Identified automated macros, removed auction listings, and engaged with webmasters and proxy networks to protect player security.

title: Software Support Consultant
description: Provided support for the Market Analyser/Pro software suite via phone, web, and email. Troubleshot application and network issues for both resellers and direct customers.
